item.title: What are Cloud native apps?
item.description: Cloud native is an approach to building and running applications that exploits the advantages of the cloud computing delivery model. In simple terms, Cloud native applications are built using cloud-based technologies, fully hosted and managed in the cloud. Cloud Native approach Here we will discuss about the four major components of Cloud native development: Microservices Containers DevOps CI/CD (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Microservices Microservices are small modular and loosely coupled services.
